context: In 2020, ANSYS maintained leadership in engineering simulation software. The company focused on digital twin and simulation-driven design trends. COVID-19 accelerated cloud simulation adoption as engineers worked remotely. Key acquisitions included Lumerical (photonics simulation) announced in September 2020. Competition focused on multiphysics capabilities, cloud access, and integration with design workflows. The EV and 5G markets drove demand for electromagnetic simulation.
